name: collectionView(_:viewForSupplementaryElementOfKind:at:)
desc: Asks your data source object to provide the supplementary view at the specified location in a section of the collection view.
declaration:
optional func collectionView(_ collectionView: NSCollectionView, 
viewForSupplementaryElementOfKind kind: NSCollectionView.SupplementaryElementKind, 
                          at indexPath: IndexPath) -> NSView
